alert.note: Alert for Roger Mills (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 10:33PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Roger Mills County through 1100 PM CDT... At 1033 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cheyenne, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cheyenne and Strong City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
